chili_map.config.title: Chili Map
option.chili_map.minimap.mode.comment:
Minimap display mode.
Single map - shows a map as a filled map would
Centered - makes map center on the player
option.chili_map.render.WaterMode.commen:
Water rendering mode.
§6IT IS NOT ADVISED TO USE VANILLA RENDERER NEAR LARGE BODIES OF WATER.§r
vanilla checks liquid depth with no limit per column of blocks.
Thorough stops after 40 blocks of liquid.
Optimistic stops after theoretical least (for zoom 0 map) required amount.
Skip ignores columns of water, just checking the top block.
option.chili_map.render.MappingMode.comm:
Render mode to use for the map.
All - Renders all chunks rendered by the client.
Vanilla - Renders map as vanilla would - using circular
    pattern.
option.chili_map.render.borderRadius.com:
Radius from the edge in which map will have checkerboard pattern.
§6WARNING: Can severely impact performance on higher values.
§6Radius 512 requires at least 31 chunks of render distance.
§6Raise at your own risk!
On higher values it's better to just use Mapping mode "All"§r
option.chili_map.render.renderDistance.c: Radius of the area rendered in "Vanilla"
